summary: This document is an email chain from November 2021 between prosecutors and defense attorneys in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, discussing scheduling meetings and requesting account ownership documents from JPMorgan for a specific account, with the relevant timeframe identified as approximately 1999. It highlights coordination between legal teams regarding trial preparation and witness identification.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Attorney from WilmerHale representing Ghislaine Maxwell, coordinating meetings and document requests with the prosecution.

persons.name: Anjan Sahni
persons.context: Prosecutor from the Southern District of New York involved in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell, copied on emails discussing document requests and meeting scheduling.

persons.name: Pat McHugh
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the defense team wanted to set up a call with, likely a witness or relevant party.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, the subject of the legal proceedings discussed in the emails.

connections.description: Defense attorney and prosecutor communicating about scheduling, document requests, and trial preparation for the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
Stoddart is arranging a call between her team and Pat McHugh, indicating a professional connection related to the case.
Stoddart is an attorney from WilmerHale representing defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Sahni is an Assistant U.S. Attorney prosecuting Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Jury Selection for Maxwell Trial
events.description: Jury selection was scheduled and underway in November 2021, impacting the availability of the prosecution for meetings.

events.title: Relevant Timeframe for Account Documents
events.description: The prosecution specifies that the account ownership documents they are requesting from JPMorgan are relevant to the timeframe of approximately 1999.

events.title: Trial Witness Identification
events.description: Ongoing discussions between prosecution and defense about identifying and subpoenaing an appropriate trial witness from JPMorgan.

keyFacts: The prosecution requested account ownership documents from JPMorgan for a specific account, with the relevant timeframe being approximately 1999.
Jury selection for Ghislaine Maxwell's trial was actively underway in November 2021, complicifying scheduling for the legal teams.
The defense team, via Allison Stoddart, was coordinating to set up a call with an individual named Pat McHugh.
The prosecution provided a broadly worded subpoena to JPMorgan to facilitate identifying a trial witness.
